```{r}
resume <- read.csv("ResumeNames.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
library(lmtest)
library(aod)
library(VGAM)
resume$name <- NULL
resume$X <- NULL
resume$minimum <- as.integer(resume$minimum)
str(resume)
```


```{r}
lm1 <- glm(call ~ ., data = resume, family = "binomial")
summary(lm1)
```

```{r}
steplm1 <- step(lm1)
```

```{r}
summary(steplm1)
```
